de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.model

Interface Restorable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractState, ContentRecyclerAdapter, TabletContentRecyclerAdapterWrapper, TabSwitcherModel

    public interface Restorable
    Defines the interface, a class, whose state should be stored and restored, must implement.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void restoreInstanceState(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Restores a previously saved state.
      void saveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle outState)
      Saves the current state.

    • Method Detail

      • saveInstanceState

        void saveInstanceState(@NonNull
                       android.os.Bundle outState)
        Saves the current state.
        Parameters:
        outState - The bundle, which should be used to store the saved state, as an instance of the class Bundle. The bundle may not be null

      • restoreInstanceState

        void restoreInstanceState(@Nullable
                          android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Restores a previously saved state.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - The saved state as an instance of the class Bundle or null, if no saved state is available
